title: Rachel Reeves – 2022 Comments on Mortgage Rates
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Rachel Reeves, the Shadow Chancellor of the Exchequer, on Twitter on 31 October 2022.
content:
Families across the country are now facing eye-watering mortgage hikes of £6,700 a year.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners

12 years of Tory failure and economic chaos are turning people’s dreams into nightmares.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners

We need stability for our economy and a proper plan for growth.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
